entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 09:45 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.0°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -21.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then periods of light snow. Blowing snow near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
